section.title: formalpara
section.programlisting: <formalpara> <title>A Formal Paragraph</title> <para>has a title that appears in bold, and a body paragraph. The title paragraph is incorporated into the body paragraph in HTML, and is separate in PDF. The body paragraph is a regular <para> paragraph, and there is only one body paragraph allowed per formal paragraph.</para> </formalpara>
